Submodules

ctrlnmod.models.ssmodels.base module

class ctrlnmod.models.ssmodels.base.SSModel(nu, ny, nx, nd=None)[source]

Bases: Module, ABC

Abstract base class for state-space models.

Attributes :

nu (int) : number of inputs ny (int) : number of outputs nx (int) : number of states nd (int, optional) : number of disturbances/exogenous signals

Parameters:

  • nu (int)

  • ny (int)

  • nx (int)

  • nd (int | None)

abstractmethod clone()[source]

Clone the model, it has to be implemented to be compliant with simulator classes.

abstractmethod forward(u, x, d=None)[source]

Forward pass of the model. This method should be implemented by subclasses. :type u: :param u: Input tensor. :type u: Tensor :type x: :param x: State tensor. :type x: Tensor :type d: :param d: Disturbance tensor. Defaults to None. :type d: Tensor, optional

Returns:

Output tensor.

Return type:

Tensor

abstractmethod init_weights_(*args, **kwargs)[source]

This method enables to initialize the weights it is both a wrapper for irght_inverse and the not parameterized weights of the module
